tile

Class AbstractTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • tile.AbstractTile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bush, DeepWater, Grass, Magma, Obsidian, Snare, Soil, Spike, StoneFloor, StoneWall, Trap, Tree, Water, Web

    public abstract class AbstractTile
extends java.lang.Object
    RougeFrame tile object
    Author:
    Ryan Luchs

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int STEP
      STEP^2 is the area of a tile in pixels
      static double TOOLTIP_BOX_RATIO
      The ratio of the height of the tooltip to STEP
      static java.awt.Color TOOLTIP_ENTITY
      The text color that tooltips for an occupied Tile displays as

      The text color that tooltips for an item filled Tile displays as
